candidate.name: Dupesh Nayak
candidate.headline: Builds Intelligent AI Systems with a Focus on LLMs

metadata.llmContext: Dupesh Nayak is a recent graduate with a major in Electronics and Communication and a minor in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision from Manipal Institute of Technology, Bengaluru (Oct 2021 - Aug 2025, 68%). He possesses strong foundational skills in Python, Machine Learning, and Data Analytics with proven ability to leverage technical skills for Process Automation and predictive modeling. His specialized skills include Data Analytics (SQL, Dashboards, Excel, Tableau, Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Validation, Data Warehousing, AWS), Technical Skills (Python, RAG, LangChain, Process Automation, GenAI, ML Development, HTML, CSS, Data Engineering), and Consulting (Stakeholder Communication, Client Presentations, Workshop Facilitation, Cross-functional Collaboration). He has completed significant projects including: (1) Improving Fine-tuned model using RAG (Oct 2024-Feb 2025) where he implemented RAG to enhance a fine-tuned AI model, improving accuracy of responses to technical queries by 20%, integrating multiple knowledge bases and developing vector database knowledge base and retrieval system; (2) Customer Survival Analysis using AI and Data Analytics (Mar 2023-Jun 2023) leveraging Data Analytics practices for predictive analysis to estimate lifetime value and customer churn, building a Random Forest model with 0.85 ROC-AUC; (3) E-Commerce Website Automation and Testing using Selenium (Oct 2022-Feb 2023) designing test cases for core e-commerce functionalities using AI agents achieving 20% reduction in testing time; (4) Data Visualization Dashboard using Python (Sep 2022-Oct 2022) developing interactive dashboards using Plotly, Dash, and Pandas. His experience includes Industry Training at Vivartan Technologies, Bengaluru (Jun 2023-Sept 2024) completing hands-on training on Embedded Systems, IoT and AI with 5 major projects; Co-Founder of Cybersecurity Club CyberSpace (Jun 2023-Sept 2024) leading industry workshops for over 1,000 participants; and Technical Intern at BSNL (Jun 2023-Jul 2023) automating network diagnostics and reducing troubleshooting time by 30%. He is also a contributor of DoHelp Foundation and VSO, lead vocalist for the MIT band, and winner of high school volleyball and music competitions. Contact: nayakdupesh@outlook.com, +91 8292927094, linkedin.com/in/dupeshnayak.

prompts: Tell me about your RAG project

messages.content: I'm Dupesh Nayak, a Data Analyst & AI Engineer with a B.Tech in Electronics & Communication and a minor in AI from Manipal Institute of Technology. I specialize in Data Analytics, Machine Learning, and Process Automation. I completed industry training at Vivartan Technologies and co-founded the CyberSpace cybersecurity club, conducting workshops for 1,000+ participants.

I work daily with Python, SQL, and Data Analytics tools like Tableau and Power BI. I'm skilled in RAG, LangChain, GenAI, ML Development, and Process Automation. I also have experience with Data Warehousing, AWS, HTML, and CSS.
Tell me about your RAG project

I implemented RAG to enhance a fine-tuned AI model, improving its accuracy on technical queries by 20%. I integrated multiple knowledge bases and developed a vector database knowledge base with retrieval system using text embeddings and chunking techniques.

I hold a B.Tech in Electronics and Communication with a minor in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision from Manipal Institute of Technology, Bengaluru (Oct 2021 - Aug 2025, 68%). I completed CBSE Science with 86.5% from Holy Cross School.
